ol.li: You cancelled an appointment at very short notice.I am writing to apologise our appointment at such short notice.
You did not attend a meeting last week.Please accept my apologies the meeting last week.
You have taken a long time to reply to a letter.Please forgive me so long to reply to your letter.
You lost a book your tutor lent you.I am writing to apologise the book you lent me.
You did not return a phone call.Please accept my apologies your phone call.
You forgot your mother's birthday.Please forgive me your birthday.
You did not meet the deadline for a written assignment.I am writing to apologise the deadline for my written assignment.
You did not inform your teacher that you were going on holiday.Please accept my apologies you that I was going on holiday.
You were not at home when a friend came to visit.Please forgive me at home when you came to visit.
You sent the wrong documents with your application.I am writing to apologise the wrong documents with my application.
You left a party without saying goodbye to your hosts.Please accept my apologies the party without saying goodbye.
You have not written to your parents for a long time.Please forgive me to you for such a long time.

p.font: There are several ways of apologising in written English. Here are three of the most common structures:

section.p: FormalI am writing to apologise for not informing you of my new address.Please accept my apologies for not informing you of my new address.
InformalPlease forgive me for not telling you my new address.

p.font: Notice that in all three structures, the introductory phrase is followed by the preposition 'for' and the '-ing' form of the verb.
